alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 01 at 2:39AM MST until September 01 at 4:00AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING FOR CENTRAL MOHAVE COUNTY... At 239 AM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms that produced very heavy rain across east central Mohave County have started to weaken. Flash flooding is ongoing. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Valentine, Diamond M Ranch, Diamond Creek Campground, Blake Ranch Road and Peach Springs. This includes the following roads... Highway 93 in Mohave County between mile markers 92 and 94. Interstate 40 in Arizona between mile markers 66 and 93. Route 66 between mile markers 77 and 109. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
